org.drip.product.definition

Class CreditDefaultSwap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.product.definition.Component
        • org.drip.product.definition.CalibratableComponent
          • org.drip.product.definition.CreditComponent
            • org.drip.product.definition.CreditDefaultSwap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentMarketParamRef
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CDSComponent

    public abstract class CreditDefaultSwap
extends CreditComponent
    This base abstract class implements the pricing, the valuation, and the RV analytics functionality for the CDS product.
